titleStmt.title: The Roman-church's devotions vindicated from Doctour Stillingfleet's mis-representation by O.N. a Catholick.
titleStmt.author: N. O.
R. H., 1609-1678.
Cressy, Serenus, 1605-1674.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Abraham Woodhead [R.H.] and by NUC pre-1956 imprints to Serenus Cressy.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
